## PathParameterMiddleware class

Middleware that is used for modifying request URL path

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PathParameterMiddleware implements RestMiddleware 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [run(this, \_id, target, methodName, \_descriptor, args, request, next)](./rest.pathparametermiddleware.run.md) |  | Runs code that is defined for this rest middleware, in this method you can modify request and response |
